channel.title: YB's blog - YB's coding journey
channel.description: YB's coding journey - work and life stories through the keyboard of an open-minded Software Engineer

item.description: A guide to using the srcset and sizes attributes to create responsive images
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Does JavaScript Promise.all() run in parallel or sequential?
item.description: JavaScript is a single-threaded programming language, so it can't run multiple things at the same time, Promise.all() actually runs promises concurrently, not in parallel!. Let's dive in to see how it works.
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Eliminating Render Blocking CSS and measuring page rendering time with Performance API
item.description: Learn how to improve your website's performance and enhance user experience by avoiding render blocking CSS. Using the Chrome Performance API to measure and optimize page rendering time.
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Successfully migrate all Shopify store assets to a new storefront
item.description: Learn how to migrate your assets from an old Shopify store to a new one in a few simple steps. This guide will show you how to retrieve and download your images using GraphQL and Node.js, and upload them to your new store with ease.
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Introduction to Committing with Conventional Commit
item.description: Conventional commit is a specific form of committing which gives software developers a uniform system for organizing and describing their changes, making it easier to keep track of updates
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: How to create an HTTPS server in localhost?
item.description: The simplest way to set up an HTTPS server in Nodejs application when developing locally
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Mastering Section Rendering APIs in Shopify Online Store 2.0
item.description: Learn how to leverage Section Rendering APIs to improve your Shopify store's performance and create dynamic, context-specific sections. Discover tips for querying dynamic section markup, including product and collection context
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Embedding scripts in web pages made easy with Github and jsDelivr
item.description: Learn how to embed scripts and styles in your web pages without the need to modify your site's existing code. Use Github to host your script and style files, and jsDelivr as a CDN to deliver them to your web page.
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Prevent layout shift when toggling scrollbar on Window
item.description: When toggling the scrollbar on the Window, the layout shifts. This is because the scrollbar is added to the Window. How to prevent this with CSS?
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Key notes while working with git
item.description: Key notes to save plenty of time while working with git for command-line-developer
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Drag and Drop API keynotes
item.description: Some keynotes to keep in mind when working with Drag and Drop APIs in Javascript
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Tricky use case of Array.prototype.map in JS
item.description: If you are familiar with functional programming, Array.prototype.map must be a function that you work with every day. We encountered a tricky use case of it at Cốc Cốc recently, it took me a while to figure out, and here's the answer...
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: When to use Function Declaration vs Function Expression in JavaScript?
item.description: Learn about the differences between Function Declaration and Function Expression in JavaScript, including their definitions, hoisting behavior, and when to use each method.
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: Simplify your Node.js project with module aliases
item.description: Tired of dealing with complex file paths in your Node.js project? Learn how to set up module aliases using TypeScript and module-alias package to simplify your imports and improve your development experience.
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)

item.title: How to make HTTP requests in Node.js without installing external libraries
item.description: Learn how to make HTTP requests in Node.js without adding unnecessary dependencies to your project using the built-in https module. Follow these simple steps to easily fetch JSON data from external APIs and servers.
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)
